Wana Brands

Logo Design / Event Planning / Marketing

3

Booze & Book Club

Booze + Book Club meets monthly to discuss the novel whilst drinking novel based cocktails. The concept was created in 2016 when I decided that I wanted to have a more relaxed and diverse book club. The brand is meant to convey a modern minimalist look and build a dedicated following. Since the inception, Booze + Book Club has gained 190+ members and will be expanding to Boulder, CO.

View Work

Photography / Web Design / Marketing

4

WunderFarms

Wunderfarms is a collective group of a set of community gardens in St. Petersburg, FL. Ray Wunderlich (owner) approached us to create a brand concept and website. The logo is based on the staple collard greens in Wunderfarms. The website is aimed to educate the consumers on their brand and also promote their CSA.

View Work
